courseDetails.title: Vigilant Leadership
courseDetails.shortDescription: Enrich Your Leadership skills and understand what that entails
courseDetails.longDescription:
Vigilant Leadership is an often overlooked aspect of Leadership.

Many people believe these are natural traits to people who find themselves in positions of responsibility and are just good at it.

In this course, I take some time to elaborate on what being a Vigilant Leader is and explore some of the ways to be one, with examples.

Being a Leader in any work of life is not easy, but can be enriched with Vigilance as a core skill entrenched.

Many attributes such as:

- Designing, planning, setting out the direction, objectives or goals

- Values based policies and healthy habits

- Effective Communication

- Accountability

and so on, support the delivery of the work in the best way possible, while fostering a conducive atmosphere.

Vigilant leaders see and prepare for changes, adapt and adopt ways of doing things, all not to the detriment of the people or function they are responsible for.   

If you are someone who is a or works as:

- A team leader

- Group leader

- Community leader

- Supervisor

- Divisional head

- Overall head of an organisation

- Cultural head

- Political head

- Leading a cause

- Work in a charity

-  Entrepreneur

- A whole segment around Vision, Purpose, Ideas and Communication as a Leader: exploring Vision, Understanding Your Role as Vision Architect, Building images of the Future, Communicating these, Managing Stakeholders, Illustrative Examples, Immediate Steps you can take today as a Leader and more.

- Building Trust as a Vigilant Leader helps people trust and take guidance from you. It facilitates you trusting yourself, your reflections of the past, observations of the present and projections of the future.

- Taking care of Yourself is vital as if impacts your ability to function properly, being Vigilant.

- Managing change. is one of the core reasons why people trust a Vigilant Leader. Are those in Leadership able to be Vigilant, device steps that help everyone achieve their goals and objectives in a changing world? We explore that.

Hold a position of responsibility within society, no matter how big or small (even within our own family and friend groups), This course is for you.


The Vigilant Leader is one that will thrive in changing times, such as we have now.

The Vigilant Leader is a Leader.


This extensive, well-rounded course is designed to be a reference and resource for you to come back to at various times, addressing questions you might have relating to the very many areas covered. 


Thank you for stopping by and hope you gain insights within the course that can help you be a better leader.


Best regards,

Baba Oyewole FCCA
targetAudiences: Everyone

In today’s complex financial landscape, having a sound understanding of financial products and services is essential not only for professionals, aspiring financial professionals, managers, business owners, policy makers, regulators, auditors, accountants, but for anyone who wants to gain an understanding of our current world.


Who is this for?

Whether you are an aspiring financial professional, a business owner, or an individual looking to better manage your financial future, this course offers you the foundational knowledge you need to navigate the financial world with confidence.


This course is covers diverse segments of the financial services sector, various products, services, associated risks with the products and attendant benefits.


Our approach

We simplify and demystify the often intimidating world of finance by breaking down key concepts and providing examples for a wide array of financial products and services in a clear, concise manner. You will explore the various financial products available, from basic savings accounts to more complex investment vehicles like bonds, mutual funds, and insurance products.


Additionally, the course will also cover the critical products within the regulatory frameworks (Central Banks), retirement products, and much, much more.

By enrolling in this course, you will gain the knowledge necessary to assess and compare different financial products, understand the role they play in the financial services sector and appreciate the role each segment plays in the wider economy, by extension.

Basics Chatbot development | Chatbot development Development | Chatbot Project

A chatbot (originally chatterbot) is a software application or web interface that is designed to mimic human conversation through text or voice interactions. Modern chatbots are typically online and use generative artificial intelligence systems that are capable of maintaining a conversation with a user in natural language and simulating the way a human would behave as a conversational partner. Such chatbots often use deep learning and natural language processing, but simpler chatbots have existed for decades.

Yes, even if you didn't know your forks from your pins, the "Process" part of the course as in the art of calculation would still enable you to play great chess combinations using an entire orchestra of tactical patterns without even knowing their names.

But training yourself on patterns will enhance your art of calculation and you will be able to name the key tactical patterns which are important for searching them out to practice and discuss with others as well as prompt during your calculations.

"Process" is like the software of your chess mind. "Patterns" are like the Content for that software. You need both the software and the content to be really effective as a tactician!.

==================

PROCESS -><-PATTERNS


YOUR STRENGTHS OF POSITION (PLUSSES +'s) ====> MATCH WITH <=== (MINUSES -'s)

DOWNSIDES OF OPPONENTS POSITION (FOR MAXIMUM DIFFERENTIAL between the PLUS AND MINUS)


BOTTOM UP APPROACHES >----< TOP DOWN APPROACHES

==================


Patterns help feed the process of calculation. Your goal often is to create a maximum differential between the strengths of your position which can be realised from very strong calculation skills and the downsides of the opponent's position which often requires a trained intuition and eye for potential downsides to ensure you are even aware combinational solutions might exist.

==================

PATTERNS: Tactical Patterns, Mating Patterns, Weakness of Position patterns.

عندما تنضم إلى دورتنا التدريبية في الإكسل، ستحصل على تجربة تعليمية شاملة تمنحك المهارات الضرورية لتحقيق النجاح في استخدام هذه الأداة القوية لإدارة البيانات والتحليل. سنقدم لك محتوى تدريبي غني يغطي جميع جوانب برنامج الإكسل ويتيح لك فهمًا عميقًا للمفاهيم والمهارات الأساسية والمتقدمة.


ستتعلم كيفية استخدام الإكسل في سياقات مختلفة وعلى نطاق واسع، من تنظيم البيانات وإنشاء جداول حسابات إلى إنشاء رسوم بيانية ديناميكية وتحليل البيانات بشكل فعال. سنركز على تطبيقات عملية وأمثلة واقعية لاستخدام الإكسل في مجالات مثل الأعمال والمالية وإدارة المشاريع.


ستتلقى توجيهًا خطوة بخطوة لتطوير مهاراتك، بدءًا من الأساسيات وصولاً إلى الوظائف والتقنيات المتقدمة. سنعمل على تحسين قدراتك في استخدام الصيغ والدوال المدمجة وإجراء التحليلات الإحصائية وإنشاء تقارير متقدمة باستخدام الإكسل.


هذه الدورة في الإكسل مناسبة لطلاب الجامعات والمعاهد الذين يسعون لتعلم مهارات إدارة البيانات والتحليل، وكذلك للمحترفين في مجالات الأعمال والمالية الذين يحتاجون إلى استخدام الإكسل في إعداد التقارير واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن المحللين والموظفين الإداريين سيستفيدون أيضًا من هذه الدورة لتعزيز مهاراتهم في تنظيم البيانات وتقديم التقارير بشكل مؤثر. وأخيرًا، فإن رواد الأعمال سيجدون في هذه الدورة أدوات قوية لإدارة البيانات وتحليل أداء الأعمال لدعم نمو مشاريعهم واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية بنجاح.


استعد لتحقيق تقدم واضح في مهارات الإكسل واكتساب الثقة في استخدام هذه الأداة الرائعة للعمل والدراسة. احجز مقعدك الآن وابدأ رحلتك نحو التفوق في استخدام الإكسل بثقة وكفاءة.
targetAudiences: المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في تعلم الإيكسل من الصفر

courseDetails.title: Learn AutoCAD 2D & 3D : From Zero to Hero
courseDetails.shortDescription: Follow Complete Step by Step instructions to become from Beginner to Pro Level in AutoCAD 2D with Perspective Drawings
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Learning & Exploring Civil Engineering Concepts & Softwares Practically.

Autodesk Revit is a building information modelling software tool for architects, landscape architects, structural engineers, mechanical, electrical, and plumbing (MEP) engineers, designers and contractors. The software allows users to design a building and structure and its components in 3D, annotate the model with 2D drafting elements, and access building information from the building model's database. Revit is 4D building information modeling application capable with tools to plan and track various stages in the building's lifecycle, from concept to construction and later maintenance and/or demolition.

Take your Revit skills to the Advanced level. First, get comfortable with the Revit environment, and learn to set up a project and add the grids, levels, and dimensions that will anchor your design. Then we dive into modeling: adding walls, doors, and windows; creating and mirroring groups; linking to DWG files; and working with floors, roofs, and ceilings. I will also shows advanced techniques for modeling stairs and complex walls, adding rooms, and creating schedules. Finally, discover how to annotate your drawing so all the components are perfectly understood, and learn how to output sheets to PDF and AutoCAD.

Finally i will also covers basics to Intermediate level of dynamo in Revit.

In this hands-on course, Google Analytics 4 Fundamentals, you’ll learn how to effectively set up, use, and interpret data in Google Analytics 4 (GA4) — Google’s latest and most advanced analytics platform.

Whether you're a beginner or transitioning from Universal Analytics, this course will help you gain the skills you need to confidently navigate GA4. You’ll start by creating your GA4 property and installing the tracking code using tools like Google Tag Manager or gtag.js. Then, you’ll dive into data streams, enhanced measurement, and understanding how event-based tracking works in GA4.

Next, you’ll explore GA4’s core reports — including traffic acquisition, engagement, demographics, and user retention. You’ll learn how to analyze where your users come from, what actions they take, and which pages or campaigns are performing best. You’ll also discover how to set up custom events and conversions tailored to your business goals.

Through step-by-step lessons, you'll gain practical experience with GA4’s Explorations, custom reports, filters, and segments — helping you turn raw data into actionable insights. You’ll also learn to avoid common mistakes and set up a clean, reliable analytics foundation from the start.

This course is perfect for marketers, website owners, small business owners, students, and aspiring data analysts. No prior experience with Google Analytics is required!

By the end, you’ll be able to confidently use GA4 to make smarter, data-driven decisions that improve your website’s performance and support your marketing goals.

¿DESEAS APRENDER A USAR Y CONFIGURAR LOS PLUGINS DE WORDPRESS PARA SITEGROUND?


SITEGROUND es un servicio de alojamiento web que proporciona alojamiento compartido, alojamiento en la nube, soluciones empresariales, alojamiento de correo electrónico y registro de dominio.  Actualmente proporciona alojamiento para aproximadamente 2,000,000 de dominios en todo el mundo.


SiteGround proporciona servicios de alojamiento web para sitios web de WordPress , Joomla , Magento , Drupal , PrestaShop y WooCommerce.


El servicio de hosting de SiteGround ofrece planes para cualquier tipo de web que tengas en mente.


SiteGround es un hosting multiservicio ampliamente recomendable para cualquier proyecto. Además de hosting, gestiona dominio, webmail, y otros servicios relacionados. Tiene un completo y profesional soporte técnico y atención al cliente dispuesto a atenderte.


¿QUÉ ES SITEGROUND MIGRATOR?


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.

Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.


¿QUÉ ES SECURITY OPTIMIZER?


Security Optimizer es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround para proteger un sitio web de WordPress y prevenir una serie de amenazas como ataques de fuerza bruta, inicios de sesión comprometidos, fugas de datos y más.


El plugin ofrece características como:

  • Evitar el malware común.

  • Defenderte contra los ataques de fuerza bruta.

  • Añadir protección XSS avanzada para proteger carpetas críticas y que no se inyecten archivos maliciosos.

  • Ocultar tu versión de WordPress.

  • Eliminar el archivo readme.txt predeterminado.

  • Proteger el inicio de sesión.

  • Habilitar verificación en dos pasos (con Google Authenticator).

  • Cambiar la URL de inicio de sesión.

  • Impedir usar «admin» como nombre de usuario.

  • Las actividades quedan registradas en el Activity log y además facilita funciones para reaccionar ante posibles ataques desde la sección «Acciones después de un hackeo» para:

    • Cerrar sesión automáticamente a todos los usuarios.

    • Obligar a cambiar las contraseñas.

    • Reinstalar todos tus plugins.


¿QUÉ ES SPEED OPTIMIZER?


Speed Optimizer es un plugin todo en uno para mejorar el rendimiento de WordPress, diseñado y desarrollado por SiteGround. Este plugin tiene todas las funcionalidades que necesitarás para asegurarse de que tu sitio de WordPress funcione de la mejor manera, sin importar en qué plataforma de hosting esté alojado.


Características esenciales del plugin para aumentar la velocidad:

  • Potente caché para tener una web hasta un 20% más rápida.

  • Optimizaciones de portada para minimizar el JS, HTML y CSS, reduciendo el tiempo de espera debido al número de scripts y caracteres de tu código.

  • Optimizaciones de medios para comprimir hasta un 85% el tamaño de las imágenes sin sacrificar la calidad.

  • Optimizaciones del entorno WordPress para optimizar el uso y la eficiencia de los recursos de tu sitio WordPress.

  • Prueba de velocidad y consejos para obtener consejos de optimización a la carta para que tu sitio sea aún más rápido.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos aprenderemos a usar y configurar los diversos plugins de WordPress para SiteGround, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá más herramientas y funciones extras para su sitio web.


¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting en SiteGround.

  • Cómo migrar un sitio web creado en WordPress a Siteground con el plugin SiteGround Migrator.

  • Cómo proteger tu sitio web en WordPress de ataques y vulnerabilidades con el plugin Security Optimizer.

  • Cómo mejorar la velocidad de carga de tu sitio web de WordPress con el plugin Speed Optimizer de SiteGround.



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Plugins de WordPress Para SiteGround", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará a usar y configurar los diversos plugins de WordPress para SiteGround.

¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay plugins de SiteGround muy interesantes y útiles que aprender a usar en la plataforma de WordPress.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

courseDetails.title: Productivity and Time Management with Generative AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Boost productivity and time management by leveraging Generative AI – Learn from a PhD with Industry Experience
courseDetails.longDescription:
Struggling to stay productive? Feel like there’s never enough time?

This practical, research-backed and GenAi-Powered productivity course will help you boost efficiency, take control of your time, and achieve more with less effort. Unlike other courses that focus on generic "feel-good" advice, this course is rooted in science, backed by real-world case studies, and packed with actionable strategies to help you increase productivity starting today. Every concept is explained with beautiful animations, practical real-world case studies as well as a demo on how to leverage Generative AI tools to implement the productivity technique in practice.


What Makes This Course Unique?


  • AI-Focus – See how Generative AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini and Notion can use used to put productivity in practice

  • Research-Backed Insights – Learn scientifically proven productivity strategies rather than vague concepts.

  • Real-World Case Studies – Discover how high achievers master time management and how you can too.

  • Fun & Engaging Animations – Retain information effortlessly with highly visual learning experiences.


Whether you're a busy professional, entrepreneur, or student, this course will provide you with the tools, techniques, and mindset shifts needed to maximise productivity and create a better work-life balance.


You Will Learn How To:


  - See how Generative AI tools can be leveraged to multiply your productivity

  - Apply quick wins to instantly increase your productivity.
  - Use the Zeigarnik Effect to stay motivated and finish tasks faster.
  - Develop a productivity mindset and eliminate time-wasting habits.
  - Master time management techniques like Pomodoro, time blocking, and task batching.
  - Overcome perfectionism and procrastination to get things done.

  - Learn the science of habit formation, the habit loop and how to break bad habits without relying solely on willpower
  - Use the best productivity apps to streamline tasks and save hours daily.


1. Productivity Quick Wins & The Zeigarnik Effect

Start your productivity transformation with instant, research-backed quick wins! Learn how the Zeigarnik Effect creates cognitive tension that keeps you engaged and focused, and how the Progress Principle helps you maintain momentum by celebrating small wins.


2. The Productive Mindset & Productivity Killers


What sets highly productive people apart? We explore the psychology of productivity and uncover common time-wasters that sabotage efficiency. You'll also discover proven methods to break bad habits, overcome distractions, and stay focused.


3. Mastering Time Management: The Best Techniques


  • Time is your most valuable asset! Learn and apply powerful time management techniques used by top professionals

  • The Pomodoro Technique – Stay sharp and productive with time-controlled sprints.

  • Time Blocking – Take back control of your schedule and eliminate distractions.

  • The 80/20 Pareto Rule – Discover how 20% of your efforts yield the 80% of results of vice versa.

  • Task Batching – Organize similar tasks together for maximum efficiency.

  • Parkinson's Law – Lean how work expands to fill available time and strategies to leverage Parkinson's Law


4. Learn the Science of habit formation


  • Learn about the Habit Loop – Discover how triggers lead to actions which lead to reward and why habits are hard to break

  • Breaking Bad Habits – Learn to design systems and checks which will help you break bad habits scientifically, without just relying on your willpower

  • Don't Break the Chain – Learn the popular comedian Jerry Seinfeld's technique of habit formation

  • Building Good Habits – Learn the science behind building good habits


5. The Best Productivity Apps & Tools


Find out which productivity apps can automate tasks, track progress, and enhance focus. These tools are used by millions worldwide to boost efficiency!


Why Enroll in This Course?


  • Actionable & Practical – No fluff, just proven methods that work.

  • Science-Backed & Research-Driven – Learn strategies based on real studies.

  • Designed for All Levels – Whether you're a beginner or already productivity-savvy, this course has something for you.

Ready to take control of your time and skyrocket your productivity? Join now and start your transformation today!
targetAudiences: Busy professionals looking to improve productivity and manage their time effectively
Entrepreneurs and freelancers seeking to balance multiple tasks and projects
Students aiming to enhance focus, beat procrastination, and excel academically
Anyone looking to develop better habits, stay organized, and achieve work-life balance
